item.title: Hard Not Tough
item.description: I was always confident that diamonds can be broken with a hammer. But my world was shattered when a guy hit a diamond with a hammer and it made a dent on the anvil. A few seconds later the same guy broke it with a comparitively powerless hit. There was definitely something shiny here. To understand what was going on I had to understand the difference between hardness and toughness.
